items.question: Can I outsource only part of the production process?
items.answer: Yes, we offer modular services that adapt to your specific needs, from laboratory analysis to complete production.

items.question: What types of products can you manufacture or package?
items.answer: We manufacture cosmetics, galenics, hygiene products and plastics. We also offer packaging services such as blister, shrink wrap, packaging, labeling and custom packs.

items.question: Do you have quality control during production?
items.answer: Yes, we implement rigorous quality controls at every phase of the production process, guaranteeing compliance with national and international regulations.

items.question: Can I use my own materials or containers?
items.answer: Yes, we can work with your materials or provide you with the necessary supplies according to your specifications.
